price: Daabi, (Dwumadi bͻne a) wͻnsa aka no awe naakye wͻ wͻn akoma mu,
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
